Metadata: California Sea Grant News (Winter 2011): Coastal Science Serving California

Articles in this issue: Off California, many common fish now spawn earlier; Coastal sage scrub restoration on a budget: mix volunteers, mulching and native planting; New Directory of California Sea Grant Appointed: James Eckman joins Scripps; A decade of cooling in Monterey and Humboldt Bays: Scientists to look at effects on fish populations; Deep crevices may protect black abalone from disease; @2 Million to fight invasive species; Satellite tracking leads to compilation of important conservation data.
